DOC.brief_summary: The University North Carolina test effectiveness Centers Disease Control Prevention 's AFIX model increase HPV vaccination coverage among adolescent . AFIX ( Assessment , Feedback , Incentives eXchange ) consist brief quality improvement consultation immunization specialist state health department deliver vaccine provider primary care setting . Using immunization registry data , specialist evaluate clinic 's vaccination coverage delivers education best practice improve coverage . We compare change HPV vaccination coverage consultation high-volume pediatric family medicine clinic across three study condition : traditional consultation ( in-person group ) , virtual consultation ( webinar group ) , consultation ( control group ) . In participate state , 30 clinic randomly assign study arm , total 90 clinic per state , 270 clinic overall . The primary objective study compare change coverage HPV vaccine initiation among 11-12 year old patient , baseline 6-month follow-up . Secondarily , compare change coverage vaccine age group .
